tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamRoster (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_country VARCHAR(100),
    foundation_year INT,
    coach_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PlayerContracts (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255),
    player_position VARCHAR(255),
    contract_duration INT,
    contract_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Player_Contracts (
	player_id INT NOT NULL,
	player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	team_id INT NOT NULL,
	contract_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	contract_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
	salary DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (player_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team_Rosters(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Player_Stats (
	player_id INT NOT NULL,
	matches_played INT NOT NULL,
	kills INT NOT NULL,
	deaths INT NOT NULL,
	assists INT NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (player_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Player_Contracts(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_contracts (
    contract_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Contract (
   contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id INT,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Player(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tournament_Participation (
   tournament_id INT,
   team_id INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (tournament_id, team_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (tournament_id) REFERENCES Tournament(tournament_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id)
);
